product_name: MACStudio Fix Fluid SPF15 24HR Matte Foundation + Oil Control
summary: SummaryMAC's original matte foundation has been remastered. The iconic 24-hour buildable, breathable foundation you know – and your skin loves – has been Fix-ed and remixed with a soft-matte finish and easy-to-apply pump. Pro Fluid Technology moves with skin for a natural look and lightweight wear.
details: DetailsBenefits24-hour, color-true wearWaterproof foundationTransfer-, sweat- and humidity-resistantDoes not cause acne and does not clog poresSPF 15 for broad spectrum protection against UV raysSuitable for sensitive skinNon-cakey coverageNon-creasingFragrance freeFree from animal-derived ingredientsRecyclable glass bottle96% said it left skin feeling breathable*91% said studio fix left skin looking natural*​93% said it did not feel drying on skin*​98% said it blended easily onto skin*​*Consumer testing on 167 women after using product for one week.FeaturesSugar Kelp extract to control oilRed Algae extract and Hyaluronic acid to hydrate skin over time87% of skincare ingredients infused in the formulaFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabenFormaldehydeTriclosanLauryl SulfateLaureth SulfateOxybenzoneD&C Yellow No.11Item 2622206How To UseCreate a petal-smooth, even canvas for color by prepping skin with Hyper Real Serumizer Skin Balancing Hydration Serum or Hyper Real SkinCanvas Balm Moisturizing Cream.First, apply foundation to the center of your face - or areas you desire more coverage - using a 170S Brush; then blend out using a tapping and swirling motion for a natural, photo-ready finish.Set makeup all day with Studio Fix Pro Set + Blur Weightless Loose Powder to diffuse, smooth and add dimension to your look.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Methyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Isododecane, Polyethylene, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Algae Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caffeine, Lecithin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Methoxy Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Laureth-7, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Propylene Carbonate, Alumina, Dipropylene Glycol []Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, Chloroxylenol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499)]Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Create a petal-smooth, even canvas for color by prepping skin with Hyper Real Serumizer Skin Balancing Hydration Serum or Hyper Real SkinCanvas Balm Moisturizing Cream.First, apply foundation to the center of your face - or areas you desire more coverage - using a 170S Brush; then blend out using a tapping and swirling motion for a natural, photo-ready finish.Set makeup all day with Studio Fix Pro Set + Blur Weightless Loose Powder to diffuse, smooth and add dimension to your look.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: Mac is a great product. I use the powder and love it. However this item wasn't the best for me. It might be my skin but it made my face look super dry and it caked it was thick and all around no good I was really disappointed!

reviews.headline: It's terrible now
reviews.comments: It's terrible now since there was a change in the formula. It's not like it used to be at all. I had to switch brands.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Complete formula change and completely disappointed….it doesn't stay on, creases and settles into lines and pores. I tried it with several preps and setting sprays spending extra time and money to compensate for what a bad foundation it is now.  At the end, it's just a very expensive, terrible performing, high maintenance messy product that is absolutely not worth it. I won't purchase this again, the bottle I did purchase was returned.

reviews.headline: New Shades
reviews.comments: I used to be a NW15, which matched my skin tone perfectly. Now, NW15 is nowhere near my skin tone. The Ulta associate told me that MAC updated their packaging, along with the product. Be aware that you might need a shade match when purchasing.

reviews.headline: No I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: It left me feeling cakey didn't blend in with my coverups.

reviews.headline: Epic fail
reviews.comments: Highly disappointed with this new formula. It has a pump now, which I thought might be a good thing, but it's not. There's no cap on the pump so foundation gets everywhere and creates a mess! The foundation itself….huge fail! It's completely different to the original and not in a good way. It doesn't stay on, it creates a greasy, splotchy, chalky finish that does not look good. I've had drugstore foundations that look better than this. I will not be buying this foundation anymore, the bottle I purchased was returned.

reviews.headline: What a mess.
reviews.comments: The coverage is uneven, oily, creases, and it transfers on whatever comed into contact with it. If tranfer was the only problem, I would use a setting spray like All Nighter, but it is not the only problem. Returning this ASAP.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: The right coverage for my skin

reviews.headline: From holy grail to epic fail
reviews.comments: This used to be my holy grail. I was loyal to it for close to 10 years. Nothing else could touch it. But I noticed with the past few bottles I've purchased, it just doesn't sit right on my face. I thought it was my skin texture changing because it was settling into my fine lines, clings to dry patches, oily in some, and separates like CRAZY, where as before, it was flawless. But then I noticed everyone on here mentioning the change in formulation and it makes sense now. I'm almost due for a new bottle of foundation but unfortunately will be looking into other products because it's not worth the price anymore.

reviews.headline: It used to be great
reviews.comments: It used to be great, the best foundation ever, now it's terrible. The change of formula has ruined it and it no longer resembles the original. It is now very light coverage, greasy and settles into all pores and lines, emphasizes texture and clumps up in a greasy, cakey mess….. After being a lifelong, loyal Mac user, I've had to move on to another brand.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: It's a good foundation if you want a matte look! I like it but it's really matte so you have to hurry and finish products quick or the foundation would dry fast! It's a good foundation, but it makes you have acne so don't use it a lot! Use it for only special occasions!

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Terrible reformulation. It's not matte…it separates into greasy clumps within the hour. It's not long lasting….it comes off with the slightest touch. It emphasizes texture and lines in your face. It's a terrible, frustrating product now. Don't waste your time or money, another foundation will perform better than this. Truly disappointing now.

reviews.headline: The reformulation has ruined it for me
reviews.comments: Ive been using this brand for over ten years and I unfortunately had to quit. The new foundation gets splotchy, weird texture, seperates through out the day, emphasizes texture, etc. im super disappointed

reviews.headline: I have this order on repeat
reviews.comments: The best coverage without looking heavy. I am 61 and it looks great on my skin. I am so Happy I found Hannah at the MAC counter and tried several samples before choosing this!

reviews.headline: Long wear & beautiful blurred, matte finish
reviews.comments: I get great coverage & a flawless finish! Been my go to for the past year now.

reviews.headline: Awful change of formula
reviews.comments: Terrible new formula. This foundation was my favorite for years and years. The change they made to it has ruined it. It's a greasy, cakey mess that ages you because it settles on every single line on your face. I will no longer wear this foundation.

reviews.headline: New formula is the worst
reviews.comments: Ugh, the new formula is awful. I had to leave Mac and find something else. This new "remastered" foundation is cakey, settles into every pore and line on my face and separates into greasy clumps! It's not matte and absolutely not oil control….it the exact opposite; a greasy cakey mess that makes skin break out.

reviews.headline: Changed formula :(
reviews.comments: Use to be my all time favorite!  But yall changed the formula like little over a year ago and I've tried and tried and it doesn't do good anymore honestly hate it so much!

reviews.headline: I dislike the new formula
reviews.comments: I use to love this foundation. The new formula is terrible. Its also lighter so now the foundation doesn't match my complexion and it seperates on my face.

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely fell in love with this foundation immediately when I applied it to my wrist because it was the perfect match and I could hardly tell I had put it on. I have never been able to find a foundation that matches my skin so perfectly! So I was already amazed from that! Then when I applied it to my face I knew it would be the only foundation I'll ever use from now on! The coverage is amazing and it just matches perfectly and has a beautiful finish. I have combination skin and tend to get a little dry/flaky around my nose, forehead and chin..which causes most foundations to look pretty bad on my skin..Even with me exfoliating and keeping my face moisturized and always applying primer it always makes me feel like I shouldn't apply foundation anymore but when I tried this with a moisturizer a bit beforehand and then a primer it honestly looked amazing!! That says a lot for this foundation because I have genuinely never found a foundation that can do this and not have flaky dry spots that are pretty noticeable. I felt so good about my skin and makeup on it just gave me so much confidence and I never thought I would find a foundation that actually looked good and worked for my skin so I was really surprised by how good it looked! It has a beautiful finish and awesome coverage and looks like I'm not wearing any foundation at all! I'm so excited and grateful that I've found this and will never use any other foundation again and I'm also going to try all of the MAC products now after seeing the unbelievable results! I've always heard good things about MAC and have always wanted to try it but I felt it was too expensive for me to purchase just for it to be like all the others..but I was so wrong and a lot of people may think it's way too expensive for what it is but I promise it IS worth it!! If you are anything like me and have the same skin type I highly recommend you give this a try just make sure if you don't have oily skin to apply a moisturizer and a good primer!
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely fell in love w/this foundation immediately!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Edit:
Below was my review from applying to wearing it roughly 3hrs.
Unfortunately hours passed that, the foundation was kind of flaking & crumbling on my skin. It almost looked like my skin was dry & that was causing the flaking but nope. I also believe this broke me out a bit. That has never happened to me. I really wanted to like this!

This foundation surprised me! I genuinely was expecting it to be more SPF feeling & smelling. It has amore of a matte finish but not restrictingly dry. 
The formula is lightweight & easy to blend. I will say when applying, apply in the area where you're working because it does kind of set quickly. Not a bad thing just looks better on the skin. 
At 1st I didn't like the way it looked on & around my nose but after changing the primer & setting it, it looked better. 
I do have a sensitive head, & this does have a very faint scent but idk why I still smelled it even hours later. Not my favorite...maybe applying some powder over it would help. 
I think different skin types will need different primers. As I mentioned on my nose I'm more oily but I had applied a matte primer, & it was almost flakey. A more blurring but not matte primer did the trick.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good & then not!
